common.metaDescription: Renowned Vedic astrologer with over 25 years of experience in astrology, numerology, vastu shastra, and gemstone consultation.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive astrological services to guide you through life's journey. From birth chart analysis to gemstone recommendations.

kundali.name: Kundali
kundali.title: Kundali Making
kundali.shortDescription: Comprehensive birth chart creation and life predictions
kundali.description: Get a detailed Kundali (birth chart) prepared by expert Vedic astrologers. Understand your life path, strengths, challenges, and opportunities through precise planetary analysis.

career.name: Career
career.title: Career & Business
career.shortDescription: Professional guidance for career growth and business success
career.description: Receive expert astrological guidance for your career and business decisions. Understand the best times for job changes, business ventures, investments, and professional growth based on your birth chart.
features: Career path analysis based on birth chart

muhurat.name: Muhurat
muhurat.title: Muhurat Advice
muhurat.shortDescription: Auspicious timing for important life events
muhurat.description: Find the most auspicious time (Muhurat) for important events like marriages, housewarming, business launches, and other significant occasions.

marriage.name: Marriage
marriage.title: Marriage Compatibility
marriage.description: Ensure a harmonious and prosperous married life with our comprehensive Kundali matching service. We analyze both horoscopes to determine compatibility across various life aspects.

vastu.name: Vastu
vastu.title: Vastu Shastra
vastu.shortDescription: Home and office Vastu analysis and remedies
vastu.description: Create positive energy flow in your living and working spaces with expert Vastu Shastra consultation. We provide practical remedies to correct Vastu defects without major structural changes.

numerology.name: Numerology
numerology.title: Numerology
numerology.shortDescription: Name analysis and lucky number consultation
numerology.description: Discover the power of numbers in your life. Our numerology services help you understand your life path number, choose auspicious names, and identify lucky numbers for important decisions.

gemstones.name: Gemstones
gemstones.title: Gemstone Recommendation
gemstones.shortDescription: Personalized gemstone suggestions based on your chart
gemstones.description: Harness the power of precious and semi-precious gemstones to strengthen favorable planets and mitigate malefic effects. Get personalized recommendations based on your birth chart.

puja.name: Puja
puja.title: Puja & Remedies
puja.shortDescription: Customized puja services and astrological remedies
puja.description: Strengthen your planetary positions and overcome obstacles through powerful Vedic pujas and remedies. We provide guidance for various rituals based on your specific needs.

horoscope.name: Horoscope
horoscope.title: Horoscope Reading
horoscope.shortDescription: Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly predictions
horoscope.description: Receive personalized horoscope readings tailored to your zodiac sign. Understand the cosmic influences affecting your life.

rudraksha.name: Rudraksha
rudraksha.title: Rudraksha Consultation
rudraksha.shortDescription: Sacred Rudraksha beads for spiritual growth
rudraksha.description: Experience the divine blessings of Rudraksha beads. We help you select the right Rudraksha based on your planetary positions and spiritual goals.

matchmaking.name: Matchmaking
matchmaking.title: Marriage Compatibility
matchmaking.description: Ensure a harmonious and prosperous married life with our comprehensive Kundali matching service.

mahurat.name: Muhurat
mahurat.title: Muhurat Advice
mahurat.shortDescription: Auspicious timing for important life events
mahurat.description: Find the most auspicious time (Muhurat) for important events like marriages, housewarming, business launches, and other significant occasions.

servicesPage.heroSubtitle: Comprehensive astrological services to guide you through every aspect of life. From birth chart analysis to personalized remedies, {name} offers expert guidance rooted in Vedic wisdom.

process.step1Desc: Call or message to schedule a consultation at your convenient time
process.step2Desc: Provide birth details (date, time, place) for accurate analysis
process.step3Desc: Receive detailed analysis and personalized guidance
process.step4Desc: Implement suggested remedies for positive transformation

servicesPage.ctaSubtitle: Book a consultation with {name} today and take the first step towards understanding your destiny and making empowered life decisions.

reviewsPage.basedOn: Based on {count}+ reviews from Google, Justdial, and other platforms
reviewsPage.shareDesc1: Had a consultation with {name}? We'd love to hear about your experience! Your feedback helps others make informed decisions and helps us serve you better.
reviewsPage.shareDesc2: Scan the QR code or click the button below to leave a review on Google Maps.
reviewsPage.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients who have found guidance and clarity through {name}'s expert astrological consultations.

zodiac.title: Explore Your Zodiac Sign
zodiac.subtitle: Discover insights about your personality, compatibility, career prospects, and more based on your zodiac sign.

hero.title: Discover Your Destiny
hero.subtitle: Unlock the secrets of the stars with personalized Vedic astrology readings

about.title: Meet
about.description1: has guided thousands of individuals on their life paths. His expertise spans across horoscope reading, kundali analysis, numerology, vastu shastra, and gemstone consultation.
about.description2: Based in Rohini, Delhi, he combines ancient Vedic wisdom with practical modern solutions to help clients navigate life's challenges in career, relationships, health, and personal growth.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Life?
cta.subtitle: Book a personalized consultation and get clarity on your life path, career, relationships, and more.

about.title: About
about.description1: is a renowned Vedic astrologer with over {years} years of dedicated practice in astrology, numerology, vastu shastra, and gemstone consultation. Based in Rohini, Delhi, he has helped thousands of individuals navigate life's challenges and make informed decisions.
about.description2: His journey into the mystical world of Vedic astrology began in his early years, inspired by the ancient wisdom passed down through generations. Through years of rigorous study and practice, he has mastered the art of reading celestial patterns and their influence on human life.
about.description3: What sets him apart is his practical approach to astrology. He believes in providing actionable guidance that clients can implement in their daily lives, rather than abstract predictions. His remedies are simple, effective, and rooted in Vedic traditions.

credentials.experienceDesc: Dedicated practice in Vedic astrology and related sciences
credentials.scholarDesc: Deep knowledge of ancient Vedic texts and astrological treatises
credentials.consultationsDesc: Trusted by thousands of clients from India and abroad
credentials.ratingDesc: Consistently high ratings from satisfied clients

expertise.title: Areas of Expertise
expertise.subtitle: With comprehensive knowledge across various branches of Vedic astrology and related sciences, offers guidance in multiple areas to address all aspects of your life.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.quote: Astrology is not about predicting a fixed future, but about understanding the cosmic patterns that influence our lives and using that knowledge to make better choices. The stars incline, they do not compel.
philosophy.description: believes in empowering clients with knowledge rather than creating dependency. His consultations focus on practical solutions and positive life changes.

contact.title: Book an Appointment
contact.subtitle: Ready to explore your destiny? Get in touch for a personalized consultation. We're here to guide you on your life journey.

info.title: Contact Information
info.whatsappDesc: Quick responses for queries and bookings

quickBooking.title: Quick Booking
quickBooking.subtitle: For fastest response, call or WhatsApp directly

prepare.title: What to Prepare
prepare.subtitle: For an accurate reading, please have the following information ready before your consultation
